price: 20. Iyadoo u majaxaabineysa dadka4 sida inay ahaayeen geedo timir jirriddoodii la rujiyey.
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
footnotes: 4. Ka soo bixineysa halkay ku gabbanaayeen.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tanziʿu al-nāsa ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin munqaʿirin
